summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KyberBusiness MVP - an alternative to InvoiceNinja. Tested authentication, role-based access control, CRUD operations for quotes/invoices/expenses, dashboard functionality, and admin panel. Backend API tests achieved 96% success rate (24/25 passed). Frontend tests successfully validated user registration, dashboard, quotes, invoices, expenses, settings, and admin panel functionality.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no auth token provided

chart_rendering_warnings.issue: Chart width/height warnings in console for Recharts components
chart_rendering_warnings.symptoms: Console warnings about chart dimensions being -1
chart_rendering_warnings.impact: Visual only - charts still render correctly

passed_tests: User registration with @thestarforge.org gets admin role
User registration with regular email gets viewer role
Admin panel accessible to admin users only
Dashboard displays stats and charts correctly
Settings page SMTP and PayPal configuration forms
All CRUD operations for quotes, invoices, expenses
Material UI theme with cyan/magenta coloring working
